prompt:
The smuggling of nuclear material across international borders has long been a concern for global security agencies.
Enrichment facilities process raw uranium into weapons-grade nuclear material under heavy international scrutiny.
A reactor meltdown in 1986 released vast amounts of radioactive nuclear material into the environment.
Terrorist groups have sought to acquire nuclear material for constructing improvised dirty bombs.
Strict IAEA protocols govern the tracking and storage of all declared nuclear material worldwide.
The theft of nuclear material from a Soviet-era facility in the 1990s fueled fears of black-market proliferation.
Handling plutonium-based nuclear material demands specialized suits to shield against alpha radiation.
Rogue nations have been accused of diverting civilian nuclear material for secret weapons programs.
Border inspections uncovered a hidden cache of enriched nuclear material in a shipping container.
The decay of unstable nuclear material produces heat that must be managed to prevent criticality accidents.
